Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class DriverController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.DriverController
@Controller public class DriverController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with contractors.
Since:
2/8/2022
Author:
Ian Black imb1007@sru.edu

      Adds all of required attributes to the model to render the drivers page
      Parameters:
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /drivers

    • showAddDriversExcel

      @RequestMapping("/uploaddrivers") public String showAddDriversExcel(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the upload drivers page when clicking "Upload an excel file" button in the Drivers section of Carrier login
      Parameters:
      model - used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      /uploaddrivers

    • deleteDriver

      @GetMapping("/deletedriver/{id}") public String deleteDriver(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a driver using the id parameter and if found, redirects user to confirmation page for deleting a driver
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the driver to be deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      /delete/deletedriverconfirm

    • deleteDriverConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletedriverconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteDriverConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a driver using the id parameter and if found, deletes the driver and redirects to drivers page
      Parameters:
      id - of the driver being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      redirects to /drivers

    • viewDriver

      @GetMapping("/viewdriver/{id}") public String viewDriver(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the drivers page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the driver to be viewed
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      /drivers

    • showDriversEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editdriver/{id}") public String showDriversEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the edit drivers page
      Parameters:
      id - of the driver being edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /edit/edit-drivers

    • driverUpdateForm

      @PostMapping("edit-drivers/{id}") public String driverUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, Driver driver, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives and passes the new driver object off to be validated Once validated the object is saved to the drivers repository
      Parameters:
      driver - holds new driver object submitted by the user
      id - of the driver being edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirects to /drivers or /edit/edit-drivers

    • showDriverAddForm

      @GetMapping("/add-driver") public String showDriverAddForm(Driver driver, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds all of the required attributes to the model to render the add driver page
      Parameters:
      driver - holds the new driver being added to the model
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /add/add-driver

    • driversAddForm

      @PostMapping("submit-add-driver") public String driversAddForm(@ModelAttribute("driver") Driver driver, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Receives a driver object by the user and passes it off for validation Once valid it is saved to the drivers repository
      Parameters:
      driver - holds the new driver created by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirect:/add-driver
